Title: Four Desperate Men
Writer: Harry Watt (adapted by), Inman Hunter (from an original story by), Lee Robinson (from an original story by), Harry Watt (screenplay), Jon Cleary (screenplay), Alexander Baron (script contribution)
Actors: Aldo Ray, Heather Sears, Neil McCallum, Victor Maddern
Plot: An escaped prisoner is trying to clear his name.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.
